title: Nick Norton, John Teske, Nat Evans
short: graphic scores, solo piano, listening and tea
long: Composer Nick Norton (LA) presents his piano piece, All The Wrong Notes, performed by Cristina Valdes, and the premiere of his Texture Sketches for strings. John Teske presents topographies, a series of graphic scores that require musicians to navigate through contour maps composed of musical symbols. Nat Evans will present a new site-specific listening and tea event entitled New Forest, preceding the performance.
address:
Chapel Performance Space
4649 Sunnyside Ave N
Seattle, WA
